methods.name: ApplicationSpecificDirectory
methods.description: Returns path to application specific directory

methods.name: AvailableStorageDirectories
methods.description: Returns a list of available storage directories

methods.name: CopyFile
methods.description: Copies file from source to destination

methods.name: CopyFileAsync
methods.description: Copies big files asynchronously and raises event 'FileCopied'

methods.name: CreateApplicationSpecificDirectory
methods.description: Creates Application Specific Directory in case it does not exists

methods.name: CreateDirectory
methods.description: Creates a new directory if it does not exists

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a file or folder.If path is a folder then it will delete all files and folders of that folder.

methods.name: Exists
methods.description: Checks that directory/file exists or not

methods.name: FileListAsync
methods.description: Get files list asynchronously from a dir which has a huge number of files

methods.name: FileListFromAssets
methods.description: Return a list of filenames from the assets

methods.name: FileOrFolderSize
methods.description: Returns size of file or folder in bytes

methods.name: FilePath
methods.description: Get path from file name

methods.name: FilesList
methods.description: Get all files list with filter(if applied).Use file extension as filter like mp3 or png else use empty string.To get folders included in FilesList use true else false in 'withFolders'.If 'recursive' is set to true then it will get files from folder recursively.

methods.name: FolderList
methods.description: Get folder list(without files) from given directory.It does not returns folders of folders

methods.name: FreeSpace
methods.description: Returns free space of a directory.Use absolute path here

methods.name: GetContentUri
methods.description: Converts filename to content uri

methods.name: IsAbsolute
methods.description: Checks that given path is complete path or not

methods.name: IsExecutable
methods.description: Checks whether a file or folder is executable or not

methods.name: IsFile
methods.description: Checks whether path is a file or not.Prefix the filename with '/' to look for the file  on the SD card. For instance /myFile.txt will look for the file /mnt/sdcard/myFile.txt.If you use '//' before filename it will check in assets. If fileOrDirectoryName starts with file:/// you can specify a complete path to the file or directory.

methods.name: IsHidden
methods.description: Checks that given file is hidden or not

methods.name: IsReadable
methods.description: Checks whether a file or folder is readable or not

methods.name: IsWritable
methods.description: Checks whether a file or folder is writable or not

methods.name: LastModTime
methods.description: Get last modified time of a file

methods.name: MimeType
methods.description: Get mime-type of a file from file name

methods.name: MoveFile
methods.description: Moves file from source to destination

methods.name: MoveFileAsync
methods.description: Moves big files asynchronously and raises event 'FileMoved'

methods.name: PathFromUri
methods.description: Get file path from content uri

methods.name: RenameFile
methods.description: Renames a file without deleting old file

methods.name: TotalSpace
methods.description: Returns total space of a directory.Use absolute file path here

name: FileTools
helpString:
An extension related to files and folders
Developed by Sunny Gupta

events.name: DirectoryCreated
events.description: Event raised after 'Create Directory' method.If directory has been created then returns true else false

events.name: FileCopied
events.description: Event raised after 'CopyFileAsync' method.If file copied then returns true else false

events.name: FileMoved
events.description: Event raised after 'MoveFileAsync' method.If file is moved then returns true else false

events.name: FileOrFolderDeleted
events.description: Event raised after 'Delete' method.If file or folder is deleted then returns true else false

events.name: GotFileList
events.description: Event raised after 'FileAndFoldersList' method.Get all files and folders from given directory
